itemLabel: Elspeth Howe, Baroness Howe of Idlicote

wikipedia_page.main: Elspeth Rosamund Morton Howe, Baroness Howe of Idlicote,  (née Shand; born 8 February 1932) is a British  life peer and former crossbench member of the House of Lords who has served in many capacities in public life. As the widow of Geoffrey Howe, she was formerly known as Lady Howe of Aberavon before receiving a peerage in her own right. She is the paternal aunt of Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall, the second wife of Prince Charles.

link_mentions.page: List of female members of the House of Lords
